dublin_core.dcvalue: Advances in information technology and communications have given rise to a range of innovative applications in the area of caregiving telehealthcare There are a number of anticipated benefits but implementation remains well below expectations The report Telehealthcare an asset for our well being produced for the French ministry of health in 2009 suggested several possible areas for deployment requiring the involvement of nurses in particular
Soins; la revue de référence infirmière
[Telehealthcare, a new asset for our well-being].
